author: jleroux
msg: Allows to run from Jenkins. See http://wiki.jenkins-ci.org/display/JENKINS/ProcessTreeKiller. Cons: the calling Jenkins job does not terminate if the log is not enabled, pros: this allows to monitor the log in Jenkins
